channel.title: Ai on WhatsUpate
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on WhatsUpate

item.title: Google AI Essentials Course Overview
item.description: In today’s fast forward world, learning artificial intelligence (AI) is super important. Google has a new introduce a new course to learn AI Google AI Essentials for free. This course can help you understand AI basics easily. You don’t have to be a computer expert to join–anyone can! Google wants everyone, no matter who they are, to learn about AI and how it can make work easier. To make sure everyone can join, Google set aside $75 million to train over a million people in the US in AI skills.
